name: SEVENTEEN KPOP QUIZ
description:
Developped by an CARAT, for all the CARAT ! 

Test your knowledge of SEVENTEEN whether you're an CARAT or just a K-POP fan ! 

SEVENTEEN KPOP Quiz is the funniest quiz application on SEVENTEEN, you will love challenging yourself to see if you're truly a CARAT !

Show to the world that CARAT is the best fandom !
